name: Mage
description: You have learned how to access mana and cast at least one hermetic magic spell.

name: Novice Mage
description: A Magic High School graduate.  You can cast a few spells and know how to handle your mana.

name: Void Touched
description: You have learned how to access mana and cast at least one hermetic magic spell.  You're a mage, Gary!

name: Novice Voidwalker
description: A Magic High School graduate.  You can cast a few spells and know how to handle your mana.

name: Cleric
description: You have bound yourself to a benevolent deity and can draw magic power from it to cast spells.

name: Novice Cleric
description: A novice cleric.  You can cast a few spells.

name: Druid
description: You have bound yourself to the lifeforce of the earth and nature and can draw magic power from it to cast spells.

name: Novice Druid
description: A novice druid.  You can cast a few spells.

name: Rune user
description: You have bound yourself to the lifeforce of the earth and nature and can draw magic power from it to cast spells.

name: Novice Runewarrior
description: A novice runewarrior.  You can cast a few spells.
